origin.medievalorigins.arachnae.name: 蛛裔
origin.medievalorigins.arachnae.descript: 蛛裔有着人类的力量，蜘蛛的敏捷和诡诈。是一个老练可怖的猎手。
origin.medievalorigins.banshee.name: 女妖
origin.medievalorigins.banshee.descripti: 女妖是饱受苦痛的亡魂，它们的哭嚎可以震碎玻璃，逼疯凡人。在神话中，它们往往被认为是死亡的征兆。
origin.medievalorigins.incubus.name: 梦魇
origin.medievalorigins.incubus.descripti: 梦魇是黑暗的爪牙。它们在自己的领域内近乎无敌，但是因为灵魂被黑暗所噬，它们对那些圣洁之物十分排斥。
origin.medievalorigins.dwarf.name: 矮人
origin.medievalorigins.dwarf.description:
矮人，务实而坚忍，傲慢而自大。它们早已适应了在暗无天日的地下采矿的生活。正因如此，它们的皮肤无法承受骄盛的太阳带来的光芒。
Rock and stone，兄弟~
origin.medievalorigins.wood_elf.name: 木精灵
origin.medievalorigins.wood_elf.descript: 木精灵，聪慧而狡诈。长期与大地接触的它们拥有者和土地与巨石那样漫长而厚重的寿命。它们在森林中十分强大。但若离开森林，它们便也失去了力量来源，变的虚弱。
origin.medievalorigins.fae.name: 仙灵
origin.medievalorigins.fae.description: 仙灵是魔法与自然的宠儿，被视为大自然的精魄，森林是它们的家园，它们以使进入森林的旅行者迷惑为乐。
origin.medievalorigins.goblin.name: 地精
origin.medievalorigins.goblin.descriptio: Obsessed with gold and treasure, goblins tend to find a little more loot wherever they look, but their small size leaves them vulnerable in combat.
origin.medievalorigins.gorgon.name: 蛇发女妖
origin.medievalorigins.gorgon.descriptio: Gorgons were humans cursed by the Gods. With hair made of writhing snakes and a horrifying visage said to petrify those who witness it, Gorgons are often called monsters.
origin.medievalorigins.moon_elf.name: Moon Elf
origin.medievalorigins.moon_elf.descript: Mysterious, ethereal beings not of this world. They're named not for their homeland, but rather the only thing their victims see before they kill them.
origin.medievalorigins.necromancer.name: 死灵法师
origin.medievalorigins.necromancer.descr: Deeply implanted in the forbidden art of raising the dead, a Necromancer can raise an army from nothing. But this morbid relationship with death comes with consequences.
origin.medievalorigins.ogre.name: 食人魔
origin.medievalorigins.ogre.description: Ogre been called brute before. Ogre no like that. Make ogre angry. Man who made angry have no head now. Man real quiet after that.
origin.medievalorigins.pixie.name: 小仙子
origin.medievalorigins.pixie.description: Harbingers of good fortune, but agents of mischief. Tiny.
origin.medievalorigins.plague_victim.des: 携带着瘟疫，它无时不刻影响着携带者，但不致死。如果使用得当，它可以成为对付敌人的有力武器。
origin.medievalorigins.siren.name: 塞壬
origin.medievalorigins.siren.description: Sirens have an ensnaring aura; their irresistible beauty is said to be the downfall of many a foolish sailor. Pity to those who confuse beauty with goodness...
origin.medievalorigins.troll.name: 巨魔
origin.medievalorigins.troll.description: Large, lumbering beasts hailing from mountains, trolls are some of the most aggressive brutes in the land. But their tremendous size can be their downfall.
origin.medievalorigins.yeti.name: 雪怪
origin.medievalorigins.yeti.description: 冰雪山峰上笨拙的巨人，雪怪的冰冷特性使他们几乎可以阻挡任何敌人，但也使他们容易受到火焰的攻击。
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/bottomles: Being a human sized spider presents unique challenges. Arachnae require a large quantity of food to stay alive.
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/brittle.d: The Arachnae's exoskeleton cannot support armor heavier than iron. This can be prevented with an enchantment.
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/climber.d: 蛛裔腿上的细刚毛使它们能够爬上墙壁。
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/fragile_e: 蛛裔的外骨骼很容易受到伤害。与普通人相比，他们的生命值较少。
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/many_eyes: 蛛裔的八只眼睛都已适应了黑暗，这让他们在光线很弱的情况下也能看得很清楚。
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/venomous_: 蛛裔的毒牙含有毒液，每咬一口都有机会毒死对手。
power.medievalorigins.arachnae/web_sling: 蛛裔可以下令织网，让它们的对手被困在其中一小段时间。
power.medievalorigins.banshee/spectral.d: Banshees possess the ability to become intangible at will, meaning they cannot be affected by foes in the physical realm. This of course comes with a cooldown. Activated with the secondary power key.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/flesheater: Banshees feast upon the organs of the living. Their spectral bodies have no desire for fruit or vegetables.
power.medievalorigins.banshee/hexed.name: 魔咒缠身
power.medievalorigins.banshee/hexed.desc: 女妖以其强大的诅咒能力而闻名。每当她们被击中，攻击者都会以很低的概率被施以缓慢而痛苦的死亡。
power.medievalorigins.banshee/immaterial: 没有肉体并非没有后果。女妖的生命只有正常人的一半。
power.medievalorigins.banshee/iron_avers: 铁对女妖是致命的。它们无法忍受戴着它。
power.medievalorigins.banshee/sonic_shri: Banshees can unleash a terrifying focused screech at one target, dealing magic damage and nauseating them.
An incubus' bloodlust is insatiable. If it isn't the flesh of an animal, its worthless.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/demon_fire: Imbued with the devil's power, the incubus can release a burst of hell's energy on command. Triggered with secondary power key.
Having spent eternities in the depths of hell, fire feels like home - it deals no damage to Incubi and satiates them.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/hydrophobe: Water scalds Incubi, damaging them on contact.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/impure.des: Much like the undead, incubi are saturated with dark energy and can not receive healing from potions.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/dimension_: As agents of hell, Incubi are not accustomed to Overworld dimensions and are weaker there. But they are considerably stronger in the Nether.
power.medievalorigins.incubus/unholy_dea: An incubus can exchange some of their life force for raw power for a short time. Triggered with Primary Active key.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/darkness_dwe: Dwarven eyes are adapted for the dark. Direct sunlight burns their sensitive retinas, blinding them until darkness returns. Prevented by wearing a gold helmet.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/dense.name: 厚实
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/dense.descri: Dwarves are heavy for their size; they sink in water.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/dwarven_tech: Dwarves can mine significantly faster than others.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/miniature.de: Dwarves are shorter than humans, but almost as wide as them
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/mythril_reso: Powerful metals which carry the spirit of your people fill you with might.
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/nocturnal_ey: 生活在地下使得矮人的眼睛高度敏感，即使在漆黑的洞穴中也能看得很清楚。
power.medievalorigins.dwarf/photoallergi: Dwarven skin is far too sensitive for the world outside of their mountainous cave homes, direct sunlight burns them, unless wearing a helmet.
Dwarves are notorious for their powerful drinks which would knock out someone twice their size. Activate to take a swig and fully restore health.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/archer.de: Wood Elves spend their whole lives training with bows - they start with one, and their arrows are more deadly.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/empowered: After charging for a few seconds, release an arrow at tremendous velocity, piercing enemies, flying further, and dealing significantly more damage.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/forest_vi: After centuries in the grove, Wood Elven eyes are well adapted to be among trees; while in forests, they can see clearly even at night.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/eagle_eye: Wood Elves' enhanced perception allows them to keep track of an enemy for a while after hitting them, even when they aren't in view.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/elegant.d: Due to their slender nature, Wood Elves can not wear armor heavier than iron (This can be prevented with an enchantment), and have less health.
power.medievalorigins.wood_elf/steward.d: Wood elves live off the forest and in harmony with it. They can not digest meat.
Wood elves are taller than the average human. Despite this, they are just as thin.
Elven arms are not as powerful, but they are quick. They deal reduced damage but attack slightly faster.
power.medievalorigins.fae/allure.name: 易被发现的
power.medievalorigins.fae/allure.descrip: 仙灵天生就很引人注目。不幸的是，这会让怪物从比其他生物更远的地方追逐它们。
power.medievalorigins.fae/diminutive.des: 仙灵的身高很少超过一米五。它们是小型生物，甚至比狡猾的地精还小。
铁可以抑制仙灵的力量。对它们来说，佩戴铁器是难以忍受的。
power.medievalorigins.fae/levitation.des: Faes are light magical creatures who can float effortlessly on the air. Press the primary active key to hover upward.
power.medievalorigins.fae/magic_resistan: 作为魔法生物，与其他生物相比，仙灵受到的魔法伤害更少。
power.medievalorigins.fae/regen.name: 再生
power.medievalorigins.fae/regen.descript: 仙灵是魔法生物。按下你的次要按键，你能在短时间内恢复生命，即使没有饥饿值。
power.medievalorigins.goblin/cunning.des: Goblins are clever creatures who know how to find slightly more rare loot, though some say it's just luck.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/frail.name: 脆弱
power.medievalorigins.goblin/frail.descr: Due to their small stature, goblins' max health is reduced, leaving them very prone to damage.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/greedy.name: 贪婪
power.medievalorigins.goblin/greedy.desc: Goblins love treasure - by simply wearing or wielding gold, they get unique benefits.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/nippy.name: Nimble
power.medievalorigins.goblin/nippy.descr: Although short, goblins are quite fast, allowing them to outrun most stronger enemies instead of fighting.
power.medievalorigins.goblin/stunted.des: Goblins are two thirds the height of a human.
Gorgons can not tolerate the purity of water and take damage from it.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/to_stone.de: Gorgons were cursed with being bound in dark, dank caves. Being outside in daylight causes them to become petrified until night. Can be negated by wearing a helmet.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/silver_aver: Gorgons are weak to the purity of silver - they can not stand to wear it and take damage when wielding it. (Iron is also counted as silver)
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/petrifying_: Meet the eyes of any mob facing you, turning them to stone briefly. Does not work on bosses or players.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/poison_bloo: Gorgons are immune to poison, and have a chance to spill their toxic blood onto nearby enemies when hit, poisoning them.
power.medievalorigins.gorgon/revenge.des: Centuries of being cursed then blamed for their misfortune has left Gorgon's bitter. They deal massively increased damage at low health.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/crazed.de: Try as they might, Moon Elves can not sleep in the overworld.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/stealth.d: In the dark, Moon Elves can turn invisible by sneaking, and move a short distance while stealthed. When attacking from stealth, their first attack deals bonus damage and ends the invisibility.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/elegant.d: Due to their slim builds, Moon Elves can not wear armor heavier than iron. This can be prevented with an enchantment.
Moon elves are thin and even slightly translucent, and their skin has a peculiar blue hue.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/moonlight: Moon Elves are most efficient wielding a light and easy to conceal weapon. They deal more damage with daggers and knives.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/fragile.d: Moon Elves have to stay lightweight to maintain their agility. They have reduced health and take increased physical damage.
power.medievalorigins.moon_elf/nimble.de: With their quick reflexes, Moon Elves have a small chance to dodge any attack.
Moon Elves are about the same height as their distant relatives of the forest, making them slightly taller than humans.
power.medievalorigins.necromancer/black_: 死灵法师只与死亡打交道。他们会使作物因枯萎而死。他们无法收获作物。
power.medievalorigins.necromancer/distur: 学习死灵术是很痛苦的。死灵法师无法入睡，他们太害怕了，不敢梦到那些他们不想知道的事情。
power.medievalorigins.necromancer/hellra: At will, a necromancer can raise a circle of skeletons, acting as a shield to block projectiles. This only lasts for a short time.
power.medievalorigins.necromancer/imperv: 对死亡的研究使死灵法师对中毒、凋零和瞬间伤害免疫。不幸的是，这也意味着他们无法获得瞬间治疗和生命回复正面效果。
power.medievalorigins.necromancer/poor_r: 不幸的是，黑魔法的学徒被大众所畏惧。村民们将拒绝与死灵法师交易，而铁傀儡将在见到他们时对其进行攻击。而作为某种奖励，掠夺者将视之为同伴。
power.medievalorigins.necromancer/resili: 了解死亡对避免死亡大有裨益。死灵法师的血量增加。
power.medievalorigins.necromancer/siphon: Rip out some of your soul and radiate it into a field around you, strengthening any mob which is not hostile to you, at a cost.
power.medievalorigins.necromancer/unguar: 将自己包裹在奥术中会让你在物质领域中受到更多攻击。大多数生物对死灵法师造成更多的伤害。
power.medievalorigins.ogre/gargantuan.de: Ogre always been called big. All ogre know is ogre can't fit through door.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/lead_belly.de: Ogre do not care what eat. Food is food. Poison? Hunger? What those?
power.medievalorigins.ogre/ravenous.name: 暴饮暴食
power.medievalorigins.ogre/ravenous.desc: Ogre hungry all the time. If ogre could, ogre would only eat all day.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/ravager.name: Ravager
power.medievalorigins.ogre/ravager.descr: Ogre like kill things with axe. Axe feel right in ogre hand.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/bloodlust.des: Ogre get mad some time. Ogre real fast when mad. But ogre hurt when mad. So ogre try not get mad too much. (Activate with Primary Active key)
power.medievalorigins.ogre/sluggish.name: 笨重
power.medievalorigins.ogre/sluggish.desc: Ogre real slow. Never won race in whole life.
Ogre like green metal. Ogre not sure why. Feel like home.
power.medievalorigins.ogre/stocky.name: 壮实体格
power.medievalorigins.ogre/stocky.descri: Ogre strong. Hard to kill ogre.
power.medievalorigins.pixie/curse_of_fli: 它们的翅膀能让小仙子飞起来，但即使是最熟练的工匠也无法为它们打造铠甲。
power.medievalorigins.pixie/feather_foot: 小仙子的小身体意味着他们完全不可能受到摔落伤害。
power.medievalorigins.pixie/flight.name: 飞行
power.medievalorigins.pixie/good_fortune: 虽然小仙子很麻烦，但它们也与好运联系在一起。采矿时，你偶尔会从普通的石头中获得一些有价值的东西。
power.medievalorigins.pixie/mischief_mak: 小仙子们可以做很多恶作剧——只要不太危险。这肯定是很吵闹的。
power.medievalorigins.pixie/pixie_proper: 小仙子是陆地上最小的生物，很少有达到普通人膝盖高度的。
power.medievalorigins.pixie/soaked.name: 浸水性
power.medievalorigins.pixie/soaked.descr: 因为它们很小，水对小仙子构成了巨大的威胁。它阻碍了它们的行动，损害了它们的飞行能力。
power.medievalorigins.pixie/troublemaker: 村民们通过仙子制造麻烦的传说了解它们，并拒绝与它们交易。
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/cont: 瘟疫的传染性很强。村民们会因为害怕感染而拒绝和你交易。
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/foul: 携带者携带着跳蚤的瘟疫。和他们在一起对健康毫无益处。
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/inso: 可怕的肿块让瘟疫携带者无法入睡。
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/plag: 虽然瘟疫会影响携带者，但他们不会受到其症状的冲击。携带者对中毒和凋零免疫。
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/risk: 你每次与瘟疫携带者接触都有50/50的几率染上疾病。他们的对手最好祈求好运……
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/sens: 瘟疫会在皮肤上造成伤痕和损坏，这使皮肤在面对接触时脆弱而痛苦。因此，由于盔甲会造成疼痛，携带者不能穿上它。
power.medievalorigins.plague_victim/skin: 鼠疫导致肌肉快速萎缩，使得生命值和速度下降。
power.medievalorigins.siren/amphibious.d: 塞壬是人鱼的一个分支，可以在水中生存，游得更快。
power.medievalorigins.siren/flammable.de: 塞壬和火不能很好地相处。任何与火焰的接触都会导致其死亡。在下界务必小心！
power.medievalorigins.siren/holy_water.d: 海妖有再生能力，当它们在水中时，再生能力将达到最大。
power.medievalorigins.siren/out_of_your_: 虽然海妖在陆地上也可以生存，但陆地不是她们的栖息环境。因此，她们的再生能力在陆地上不起作用，受伤时只能用药水治疗。
power.medievalorigins.siren/prone.name: 易伤
power.medievalorigins.siren/prone.descri: 虽然海妖的身体可以再生，但她们对抗钝器伤害很弱。近战攻击会对她们造成更多伤害。
power.medievalorigins.siren/siren_song.d: Sirens are known for their alluring calls. Press the primary active key to make all mobs around you neutral until hit. Does not work on bosses or players.
power.medievalorigins.siren/seduce.name: Captivate
power.medievalorigins.siren/seduce.descr: A siren can overwhelm with their beauty, convincing villagers to give more favorable trades. To perform, look at a villager and press the secondary active key.
power.medievalorigins.siren/water_vision: 与其他生物相比，塞壬具有更好的水下视力。
power.medievalorigins.troll/apex_predato: 巨魔不能吃普通的食物，只能通过屠杀其他生物来充饥。
power.medievalorigins.troll/ham_fisted.d: 虽然巨魔的巨大拳头能打出有力的一击，但它们太笨重了，无法使用盾牌。
power.medievalorigins.troll/ironhide.des: 巨魔有非常厚的皮肤，给予他们天然的护甲和大量的生命值。
power.medievalorigins.troll/lumbering.de: 当你像巨魔一样大的时候，你就需要支撑很多体重。它们的移动速度明显比人们想象的要慢。
由于巨魔追随他们来自的山脉。他们非常高，是普通人的两倍。
power.medievalorigins.troll/old_blood.de: 巨魔血液中流淌的古老血脉与群山相连。离开家乡的丘陵，他们就无法治疗自己。
power.medievalorigins.troll/out_of_stock: 尽管他们可能会尝试，但巨魔似乎永远无法找到任何与他们的体型相称的盔甲。因此，他们注定只能带着大自然给他们的盔甲行走，仅此而已。
power.medievalorigins.troll/rock_throw.d: 巨魔可以随意地向空中投掷一块大石头，穿过任何可能穿过的地方。然而，这是以64块珍贵的圆石为代价的。
power.medievalorigins.troll/thunderous_s: 巨魔有目的的行走。只要他们坚持的时间足够长，他们就能径直穿过路上的任何障碍。
power.medievalorigins.yeti/flammable.des: 由于他们的寒冬体质，雪怪很容易受到火焰伤害。
A powerful magic runs through the veins of a yeti, allowing them to entomb a group of foes in ice on command. Does not work in the nether or on bosses.
power.medievalorigins.yeti/from_whence_y: 雪怪在他们出生的土地上茁壮成长，他们在寒冷的生物群系中移动得更快，并能在雪地上免疫摔落伤害。
power.medievalorigins.yeti/frosty_breath: 雪怪冰冷的呼吸减慢了接近它们的对手的速度。
power.medievalorigins.yeti/thick_fur.des: 在沙漠中，厚实的皮毛会变成诅咒。你的行动变慢，生命值下降到正常人的水平。
power.medievalorigins.yeti/titanic.name: 泰坦之躯
power.medievalorigins.yeti/titanic.descr: 雪怪的生命值比一般人高得多。
power.medievalorigins.yeti/winter_body.d: 雪人比一般的人类稍高，也更宽。
enchantment.medievalorigins.featherweigh: With this enchantment applied to heavy armor, it can be worn by Arachnae and Elven origins
medievalorigins.contagious_villager: This villager has already been infected!
medievalorigins.disturbed_restless: 你知道的将会杀死你，但你会笑死。
medievalorigins.moon_elf_no_sleep: The strange sounds of this foreign world leave you restless.
medievalorigins.insomniac_welts: 你的伤痕刺痛并且灼热。今晚将是个不眠之夜。
medievalorigins.troublemaker: 村民不会与像你这样的人交易！
